mapper.select: select count(*) from liancdrall where caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0
select COUNT(*) as sum FROM lianfsdb.liancdrall a1 WHERE true and (a1.liancalltype='outcall')
select COUNT(*) as sum from lianfsdb.liancdrall a1 where true and (a1.liancalltype='incall') and (a1.bleg_uuid!='')
select count(*) from liancdrall where caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and liancalltype is not null and liancreatetime like #{time}
select count(*) from liancdrall where caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and caller_id_name = #{workID}

select COUNT(*) as sum FROM lianfsdb.liancdrall a1 WHERE true and (a1.liancalltype='outcall') and caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and liancalltype is not null and liancreatetime like #{time};

select COUNT(*) as sum from lianfsdb.liancdrall a1 where true and (a1.liancalltype='incall') and (a1.bleg_uuid!='') and caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and liancalltype is not null and liancreatetime like #{time};
select count(*) from liancdrall where caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and caller_id_name = #{workID} and liancreatetime like #{time};
select count(*) from liancdrall where caller_id_name not like 'Extension%' and billsec>0 and liancreatetime>=#{startTime} and liancreatetime<=#{endTime}
